page.title: 10A TYPICAL DAY(CONT)
page.content: My best friend is Benny and I always play with him.At playtime we normally play football.The normal team is me, Benny and my brother Mark against all the other boys,and we still win.We have half an hour playtime, and intime is at eleven o'clock and play begins at half an hour past ten.After intime we do sums or English for forty five minutes, until eleven forty five, then we get ready for dinner .We go to the toilet and wash our hands,then say our prayers.Then we go out to play while the first sitting eat.They take about half an hour to finish their meal.We are faster because we are much older.The bell is rang at one o'clock. Each afternoon we do something different-today is special,it's Thursday-football day.Ilove football. We usually play for about an hour.
